Writers.

Jared Young

Jared grew up in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, where he spent his high school years working as an usher at the local movie theatre. His reviews and essays have appeared in newspapers and magazines across the world – including the Toronto Star, Bangkok Post, Ottawa Citizen, Maisonneuve, and The Walrus, among others – and has also been anthologized by McSweeney's.
